response.original_title: 穿越時空發現日月潭——白鹿卷
response.overview: Film part of a 4D ride in the Formosan Aboriginal Culture Village at Sun Moon Lake in Taiwan. Travel with an aboriginal boy and his animal friends through crags, oceans, and forests to get a glimpse of the fabled White Deer and be blessed with its luck. Dig into local spiritual traditions and enjoy the natural scenery of Taiwan.
response.title: Time Travel · Discovering Sun Moon Lake: White Deer Chapter
